name: time_zone_time
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool geodb_cities.
Tool description: Get global city, region, and country data. Filter and display results in multiple languages.
API description: Fetches the current time for a given time-zone ID in ISO-8601 format (HHmmss.SSSZ) using the GeoDB API.

zoneid.description: The ID of the time-zone for which the current time is to be fetched.
